title: 7-3 placements?
body: I was bronze 3 last seasons (S5) and i just did my promos and went 7-3 in S6 promos and now am bronze 3 which last promos in S5 i went 6-4 and i get bronze 4 for getting 7-3???????????

replies.body: S4 at season end, got 6-4 and went to S5
People in lower elos are being placed far lower than they used to be but your MMR is a large factor. If you don't have amazing MMR then your placement is probably going to be screwed.
Placement is fucked up. My friend who was plat 2 last season is silver 5 despite winning 8/10 of his games.
I won 7/3 i was sliver 1 now bronze 4
